Text: Delmarva Heat RateBlack Tom Zenner asked me to follow up with you regarding the Delmarva Heat rate as he is out of town for the rest of the week Pursuant to the proforma you have the heat rate is estimated to be BtuKWh HHV I hope this is what you are looking for If not please dont hesitate to contact me at Regards Patrick Smith TM Power Ventures

Message from Internet Cc Rogers Just to quickly address your questions in advance of our call in the morning I offer the following The debt amount contemplated was based on assumptions given by Enron The rate given was kW or MM in debt This would be obtained via a A Bond offering without any subdebt There are three operating fees listed in the proforma currently Management fee kyr to the Owners as contracted OM Fee kyr to the Operator contemplated to be TECO Power Services TPS and the TPS Parts Company for a spare engine The TPS Spare engine may be eliminated provided we can get comfort via other methods The financing fees were estimates based on discussions with Enron and our engaging CSFB The Maintenance Reserve account is accrued based on operating hours of the plant and planned major maintenance as estimated by TPS the OM Operator This reserve may be eliminated as we currently are estimating that this plant will never reach a major outage I look forward to discussing these issues with you in the morning Regards Patrick Smith TM Power Ventures
